name: Sün: the Ultimate Quest
description:
Plot:

You are a moth. And like all moths, you love the light. One day, you decided with all your mothly might that you will reach the ultimate light: the Great Sün!

Description of the Game:

A 2D side scroller where you'll have to go as far as you can without touching the meteors to have the highest score. Use the Up and Down arrow keys on your keyboard to avoids the obstacles.

Credits:

Core Programming: https://timo-andre.itch.io/
High Score Programming, UI: https://itch.io/profile/da-lu294
Music: https://itch.io/profile/rocketeclair
Main Character Design, UI, In-Game Background: https://omamelli.itch.io/
Splash Art, Illustrations, Team & Game Logo, Particles, Obstacles: https://diabloo-666.itch.io/
